title: Instructional Design Practical Competency Enhancement: Mobile Microlearning for English Proficiency in Science

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can perform daily conversations using 200 basic science-related terms.
Learners can apply situational English expressions with over 80% accuracy in travel simulation scenarios delivered via mobile.
Weekly formative assessments improve science-related English communication skills by over 10%.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
